LIDAf.1 = {
	# MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE: Spicing it Up
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.1.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day

		event_background = corridor_day

		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market

	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room

	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.1.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:bedchamber
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 88
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 89
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 88
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 88
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 89
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 89
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 88: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.88
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 88
				scope:first_transition_1 = 88
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 88
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 89: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.89
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 89
				scope:first_transition_1 = 89
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 89
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}

	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}

					value = 93
				}
			}

			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 92
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 92
				}

					name = first_transition_1
					value = 93
				}
			}
		}

			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}

		# 92: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_VASSAL -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE

			name = sex_transition
			value = 92

LIDAf.4 = {
	# MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL: Privileges of Power
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.4.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon

		event_background = dungeon

	override_background = {

	override_background = {

	override_background = {

	override_background = {

		event_background = throne_room

	override_background = {

		event_background = garden

	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}

		desc = LIDAf.4.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {

			name = locale
			value = flag:study
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 94
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 95
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 94
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 94
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 95
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 95
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 94: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.94
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 94
				scope:first_transition_1 = 94
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 4
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 94
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 95: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.95
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 95
				scope:first_transition_1 = 95
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 4
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 95
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.5 = {
	# MEETING_WITH_LIEGE: Mead in my Room?
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.5.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.5.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:bedchamber
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 96
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 97
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 96
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 96
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 97
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 97
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 96: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_LIEGE -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.96
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 96
				scope:first_transition_1 = 96
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 96
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 97: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_LIEGE -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.97
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 97
				scope:first_transition_1 = 97
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 97
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.6 = {
	# MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL: An Intimate Discussion
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.6.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = throne_room_bow_1
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.6.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:council_chamber
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 98
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 99
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 98
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 98
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 99
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 99
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 98: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.98
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 98
				scope:first_transition_1 = 98
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 98
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 99: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.99
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 99
				scope:first_transition_1 = 99
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 99
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.7 = {
	# MEETING_WITH_PRISONER: Taste of Heaven in Hell
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.7.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = prisonhouse
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.7.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:dungeon
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 100
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 101
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 100
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 100
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 101
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 101
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 100: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.100
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 100
				scope:first_transition_1 = 100
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 7
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 100
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 101: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.101
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 101
				scope:first_transition_1 = 101
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 7
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 101
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.8 = {
	# MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL: The Sweetest Torture
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.8.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = prisonhouse
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.8.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:dungeon
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 102
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 103
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 102
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 102
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 103
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 103
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 102: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.102
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 102
				scope:first_transition_1 = 102
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 8
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 102
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 103: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.103
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 103
				scope:first_transition_1 = 103
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 8
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 103
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.9 = {
	# MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE: Who Owns Who
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.9.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.9.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:sitting_room
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 104
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 105
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 104
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 104
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 105
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 105
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 104: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.104
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 104
				scope:first_transition_1 = 104
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 9
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 104
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 105: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.105
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 105
				scope:first_transition_1 = 105
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 9
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 105
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.10 = {
	# MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL: A Chance Encounter
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.10.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.10.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:courtyard
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 106
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 107
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 106
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 106
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 107
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 107
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 106: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.106
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 106
				scope:first_transition_1 = 106
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 10
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 106
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 107: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.107
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 107
				scope:first_transition_1 = 107
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 10
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 107
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
